svg.content: <mxfile userAgent="Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_14_5) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/75.0.3770.100 Safari/537.36" version="7.9.5" editor="www.draw.io"><diagram id="1411eb64-6b1d-ad9c-a30c-818588887972" name="第 1 页"></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 155px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div:
屏幕上方缓存数据项列表
（一屏数据项倍数，由属性windowSize（上下屏缓存总和）控制）

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 155px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

div.span: 屏幕下方缓存数据项列表
div.div: （一屏数据项倍数，由属性windowSize（上下屏缓存总和）控制）

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 97px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 155px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div:
尾部空白区
（一个空白模块，高度为对应数据项高度累加，代替未展示的数据项占位，避免内存消耗）

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 155px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div:
初始渲染数据项列表
（由属性initialNumToRender和initialScrollIndex控制，
会一直存在，不会移除，主要为了快速显示或滚动到第一页）

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 155px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div:
头部空白区
（一个空白模块，高度为对应数据项高度累加，代替未展示的数据项占位，避免内存消耗）

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 172px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 158px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 191px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

pre.pre:
可预见区开始位置overscanBegin
可预见区开始索引overscanFirst

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 184px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

pre.pre:
可预见区结束位置overscanEnd
可预见区结束索引overscanLast

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 121px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: 屏幕展示的数据项列表

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 196px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 146px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 150px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

pre.font: 已渲染列表项结束索引last
